title: What is the 'My Profile' section on the mobile app? : BookMyShow Support Centre
body:
The profile gives you insight about your account.
You can scroll through your Profile which is lined up with :
Superstar status, Your Order, Stream Library, Play Credit Card, Help & Support, Accounts & Settings, Rewards, Restaurant Discounts, Discount Stores, Offers, Gift Cards, Food & Beverage, BookAChange
, it has all of it.
All set for the movie, click on 'Profile' go-to 'Your Orders' flash the booking details and you're done.
